#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,k;
        cin>>n>>k;
        signed long long int a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        if(k==1)
        {
            cout<<0<<"\n";
            continue;

        }
        signed long long int b[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            b[i]=0;
        int coun;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            coun=1;
            for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
            {
                if(a[i]>0)
                {
                    if(a[i]==a[j])
                    {
                        a[j]=0;
                        coun=coun+1;
                    }
                }
            }
            b[i]=coun;
        }
        signed long long int temp=b[0];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(temp<b[i])
                temp=b[i];
        }
        cout<<k-temp<<"\n";
    }


    return 0;
}
